node.category: What is the way things are?

node.surface: Yes, it's annoying and cumbersome to separate your rubbish properly all the time.

node.category: Why is it annoying to separate your rubbish properly all the time?

node.surface: Three different bin bags stink away in the kitchen
and have to be sorted into different wheelie bins.

node.category: Why should we separate our rubbish?

node.surface: But still Germany produces way too much rubbish
and too many resources are lost
when what actually should be separated and recycled is burnt.
We Berliners should take the chance and become pioneers in waste separation!
